description:
Versatile water filtration for where ever your adventure takes you. Connect the microfilter to the reservoir at base camp for a convenient gravity filter, attach it to a hydration bladder or disposable water bottle while you're on the go, or use it as a personal straw and sip straight from the water source. The redesigned reservoir is more durable to withstand the rigours of the backcountry.

  • 8L dromedary is ultra-durable and collapsible
  • Membrane microfilter treats up to 2000L (varies with water quality)
  • Removes up to 99.99999% of waterborne bacteria, and up to 99.999% of waterborne parasites and microplastics
  • Plastic filter casing is made with 50% recycled content
  • Webbing handle for hanging and carrying
  • 1.2m quick connect hose is compatible with other systems
  • Included backwash syringe for cleaning filter
  • LifeStraw’s Follow the Liters program provides a child in a developing country safe with drinking water for an entire school year with every LifeStraw product sold
name: LifeStraw Large Capacity Gravity 8L Water Filter System
